description: Main front-end application component for a React Native Tic-Tac-Toe game, including an error boundary for handling runtime errors and rendering the game screen within a styled view.

classes.name: ErrorBoundary
classes.description: React component that catches JavaScript errors anywhere in its child component tree, logs those errors, and displays a fallback UI.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main functional component that renders the game within an error boundary and styled views.

methods.name: ErrorBoundary.getDerivedStateFromError
methods.description: Updates state to indicate an error has been caught, with error message.

methods.name: ErrorBoundary.componentDidCatch
methods.description: Logs error details when an error occurs within child components.

methods.name: ErrorBoundary.render
methods.description: Renders fallback UI if an error has been caught, otherwise renders children components.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Functional component serving as the app's root, rendering the game screen within the error boundary.
